🌟 Supporting Mobile App Development

I'm an independent developer dedicated to creating a better mobile experience for Directus through my iOS and Android apps. This project is built with passion and dedication, maintained by me to provide a high-quality, user-friendly mobile solution for the Directus community. Your sponsorship directly supports continued development, maintenance, and innovation of these mobile apps.

💝 Why Sponsor?

- Support sustainable independent app development
- Help ensure regular app updates and maintenance
- Enable new features and improvements
- Contribute to better documentation and tutorials
- Support bug fixes and compatibility updates
- Help fund development tools and testing devices
- Enable more time for user support

By becoming a sponsor, you're not just supporting an app - you're investing in the future of mobile access for Directus and helping create a better experience for users worldwide.

🌟 Custom Sponsorship

For organizations interested in custom sponsorship arrangements or one-time contributions, please reach out to me directly. I'm happy to discuss tailored sponsorship packages that align with your organization's needs while supporting continued app development.

💫 Impact of Your Support

Your sponsorship helps me:
- Dedicate more time to app maintenance and improvements
- Develop new features and capabilities
- Create better documentation and tutorials

- Ensure long-term app sustainability
- Support both iOS and Android development

Thank you for considering sponsorship of my Directus mobile apps! Every contribution, regardless of size, helps me continue developing and maintaining these valuable tools for the Directus community.

Together, we can create better mobile experiences for Directus users everywhere. 🚀
